This was personally suppose to be only mine, but I guess other students in other counties can use this. The only problem is that there's the Broward logo in the upper left and right hand corner (may or may not appear for you as well). This theme also includes various fixes such as positioning issues and corrected padding.

usercssData.author: pmer
usercssData.description: Remove all the distracting stuff (other sites, chat rooms, meta posts, ads) from your vision, focusing in on resolving your technical problems first.Based on hardy tomâ€™s original Undistractify StackOverflow but adds removal of simple sidebar ads along with requests to join the site (for when you're signed out & don't want to bother signing in). Also adds more StackExchange domains that this style will apply to.

    #refine-category-list .cancelmultipleselect {color:#a50;}
    
    .gallery-mode .new-discount-rate,
    .new-discount-rate {background-color:#e62e04; color:#fff;}
    .p4pExpress .img-box-wrap {border-color:#292929;}
    .p4pExpress ul.p4p-bottom-content {padding:10px 25px 15px;}
    .p4pExpress h4 {padding:10px 0;}
    
    .sell-sp-main .sp-icon,
    .s-company-table tbody tr:hover {opacity:0.6;}
    
    .industry-floor,
    .main-venue-wrap,
    ._new-top-container-bg,
    .industry-group .industry-items .product-list::after,
    .industry-group .industry-items .product-list::before {background-color:#030608;}
    
    .images-view-wrap .images-view-list li.active {box-shadow:0 0 0 2px #ef0404;}
    .images-view-wrap .images-view-list li {box-shadow:0 0 0 2px #ccc; border-radius:2px;}
    .images-view-wrap .images-view-list li .images-view-item img {max-width:none; max-height: none; width:100%; height:100%;}
    .javis-robot {border: 1px solid #00143f; background:#000612;}
    .javis-robot .robot-list {border-color:#191919;}
    
    .sa-me .sa-address-list .sa-default, 
    .shipping-address .sa-address-list .selected {background-color:#000b0d;}
    .pnl-shipping dd {margin-left:65px;}
    .price .value {font-size:12px;}
    .ui-window-shipping .s-company-table-wrap {max-height:420px;}
    .ui-window-shipping .s-company-table thead td {height:50px;}
    
    
    .detail-tab-bar .tab-item.active .tab-inner-text::after {border-color:#fff;}
    .store-collection .shopping-cart-store .shopping-cart-product .product-container .product-field.product-main .product-price .cost-extend .cost-tag,
    .product-price .product-price-mark {background:#000e0e;}
    
    .sku-wrap .sku-property-item, 
    .sku-wrap .sku-property-item.disabled {box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 1px #333;}
    
    .detail-fixed-tab,
    .ui-autocomplete,
    .next-balloon-normal,
    .container-radius:hover,
    .mall-list .brand-type ul li,
    .mall-header-wrap .cl-item .sub-cate,
    .ui-price-histogram .ui-histogram-ballon,
    .detail-fixed-tab .fixed-store-info-content,
    #tmall-pc-menu-from-common > ul > li .menuwrap,
    .home-firstscreen .categories-list-box .cl-item .sub-cate,
    .mall-header-wrap .categories-main .categories-list-box,
    .mall-header-wrap .new-categories-main .cl-item-unfold .cate-name {box-shadow:0 0 10px 0 #fff3;}
    
    #tmall-pc-menu-from-common > ul > li.hover > a {box-shadow:0 27px 30px 0 #fff3, 0 1px 2px 0 #fff3;}
    .home-firstscreen .cl-item:hover .cate-name span {box-shadow:-8px 0 10px 0 #fff3;}
    .home-firstscreen .categories-list-box .cl-item .sub-cate {border-radius:0 8px 8px;}
    
    .home-firstscreen .cl-item .cate-name span,
    .home-firstscreen .cl-item:last-child .cate-name span,
    .home-firstscreen .cl-item:first-child .cate-name span,
    .home-firstscreen .cl-item:first-of-type:hover .cate-name span {height:35px; line-height:32px;}
    
    .home-firstscreen .cl-item:first-child:hover .cate-name span::before,
    .home-firstscreen .cl-item:first-child .cate-name span::before {top:5px;}
    
    .may-like .may-like-img,
    .recommend-item .item-img {height:100%; width:100%; top:0; left:0; transform:none; border-radius:0; object-fit:cover;}
    
    .wslogin-loading,
    ._new-home-firstscreen .advertise-main .brand-banner-open .img .price {z-index:100;}
    
    .container #signInField {width:auto;}
    .category-menu .menu-container {overflow:hidden;}
    .home-firstscreen .cl-item:hover .cate-name a {color:#E62E04;}
    .home-firstscreen .cl-item:hover .cate-name span {font-family:inherit; font-weight:inherit;}
    
    .sub-cate-items dt a,
    .sub-cate-items dt a:hover,
    .visual-category-item a:hover span,
    ._new-home-firstscreen .channel-entrance a:hover {text-decoration:none;}
    
    ._new-home-best-match .product ul li .shadow {z-index:0;}
    .searchbar-form .header-search-btn button {line-height:normal;}
    
    .cl-item:first-child .cate-name span,
    ._new-home-firstscreen .categories .categories-list-box {padding-top:0;}
    
    .cl-item .sub-cate {top:0;}
    .survey-link {right:0;}
}
